HediffDef.label: Neural manipulator
HediffDef.description: This device is installed directly into the brain, giving the SkyMind network intimate access to the subject's neural structure. Through this relay, a connected Core can instantaneously trigger insatiable bloodlusts, serene coma-like trances, and various other effects - all without the consent of the implant's host. Naturally, this is extremely unnerving, but does allow all the same functionality as a transceiver.\n\nSuccessfully implanting or removing this implant has no other major consequences.
